entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. Areas of blowing snow from recent snowfall reducing visibility to a half mile at times. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Interstate 80
